column5: Loft is very private. NOT SUITABLE for children. (no baby gate etc)Safety issue for children/toddlers..Adults only. newly finished with Spanish saltilo flooring, new bathroom and refrigerator. Perfect for short stays. The location is great! 3 miles from Downtown San Antonio. Great for site seeing and visiting all the best tourists hot spots. Parking is private and FREE! I am retired, United States Marine Corps. If you need more than a weeks stay, it can be negotiated.
column8: Private Loft near downtown San Antonio
